info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:22AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Mercer, southern Henry and southwestern Bureau Counties through NOON CDT... At 1122 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andover, or near Cambridge, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodhull around 1125 AM CDT. Cambridge around 1130 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Galva. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 19 and 23. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 22 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
